Home » 40P8 Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)
52 Kilesasampayuttaduka
Kilesasampayuttaduka
71.
222Nakilesasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakilesasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
223Nakilesavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakilesavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
224Nakilesasampayuttañca nakilesavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakilesasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
225Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
